title: Here's a tip to people who get chat restricted among other punishments
body: If these 9 other people were strangers you paired up with in real life in some random gathering, let's say a concert or maybe at a restraunt; would you say the crazy ass shit in real life to them that you say in-game? And don't pretend to be some hard ass because for 99% of you, the answer is no, you wouldn't because you're either a twig with skinny jeans, pale and mouth breathing or a fatso who couldn't throw a punch if it an extra chicken nugget from McDonald's depended on it. So check yourself, not sure why you expect to be able to tell people to kill themselves and not suffer some sort of consequences for it.
